meanings.definition: The quality or state of being brass.
meanings.sent1: Her brassiness in the meeting made everyone notice her.
meanings.sent2: The brassiness of the doorknob gave it a shiny appearance.
meanings.sent3: His brassiness in wearing a bright yellow suit to the funeral raised some eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: The brassiness of her personality shone through in her confident speech.
meanings.sent5: The brassiness of the trumpet's sound echoed through the hall.

meanings.definition: The sound quality of being harsh or strident.
meanings.sent1: The brassiness of the cymbals clashed loudly in the orchestra.
meanings.sent2: The brassiness of the car horn startled the pedestrians.
meanings.sent3: The brassiness of the alarm clock woke him up abruptly.
meanings.sent4: The brassiness of the thunder made the windows rattle.
meanings.sent5: The brassiness of the fire alarm pierced through the silence of the building.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being bold or showy.
meanings.sent1: Her brassiness in fashion always turned heads.
meanings.sent2: The brassiness of his tie stood out in the sea of black suits.
meanings.sent3: The brassiness of the peacock's feathers captivated the zoo visitors.
meanings.sent4: The brassiness of the neon sign attracted customers to the store.
meanings.sent5: The brassiness of her jewelry complemented her confident demeanor.
